snippet.title: Touhou 東方導命樹 ～ Mystical Power Plant (Danmakufu) - Lunatic Omote 1cc
snippet.description:
From the makers of The Last Comer, Mystical Power Plant is one of the newest products in the fully-fledged Touhou fangame department. 

The system seems to be revolving around picking up the leaf items. If you pick up a certain amount they will give you a level with a skill attributed to it. Level 1 will always give you the POC in addition to the skill it gives. If you increase the level above max it will go back to zero and the game will give you a life and bomb fragment. 

So far as I know the skills for Reimu!B are:
Avoidance - Makes your hitbox smaller. 
Spirit Recovery - Increases the Invulnerability after using a bomb or dying.
Reflexes - Increases your deathbomb window. 
Other characters have different skills. 

The scoring system seems to involve chaining by damaging enemies. Doing so raises the multiplier in the bottom right to a maximum of x999. At that point all cancelled bullets will be turned into point items. 

Reimu!B is a very nice shottype. In addition to good long distance damage, Utsuho's shotgun is extremely powerful and their bombs are pretty decent too. 

So yeah as you can see in the last part, the normal game is the omote loop and there's a harder Ura loop. 
Ura loop - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=51mqCkqOzH4

Download:
http://th-jss.cocolog-nifty.com/blog/
